climbs.name: Trumpster Fire Direct
climbs.fa: Bryan Haslem, Sean Cobourn and Jade Nunns  (ground up) 2020

content.description: Mantle on right end of ledge and follow bolts straight up to an out of view anchor on large shelf area.
content.location: From where trail hits rock go right a short ways to a small clearing.  This is rightmost bolted line.

climbs.name: Trumpster Fire
climbs.fa: Sean Cobourn and Kyle Sox  October (ground up) 2019

content.description: Mantle up on ledge at head level.  At fourth bolt hang a hard left past three bolts to a bowl with anchor shared with Fake News.
content.location: From where trail hits the rock, go right a short ways to a small clearing.  This route is line of bolts at right end of ledge to left of water streak.

content.description: This is a connector between the bowl anchor of Fake News/ Trumpster Fire and the anchor of Drain The Swamp.  Climb up and left (mostly left) past three bolts to anchor.  There is a difficult project beneath this anchor that has not been lead climbed.
content.location: Start at anchor of Fake News.

climbs.name: Fake News
climbs.fa: Kyle Sox, Sean Cobourn, Jared Hancock and Barbara Mensch (ground up) 2020

content.description: 1. Mantle up on right end of small ledge that is also start to Trumpster Fire.  Traverse to left end of ledge.  Climb up past several bolts to an anchor in a bowl.  Crux is getting to and past second bolt.  2. Pitch two goes straight up past several bolts to an anchor.  Optional gear on pitch two if you want it.
content.protection: bolts and optional cams from TCU to hand size.
content.location: From where trail hits rock, go right to a small clearing.  Ledge start is obvious.  There is usually a wet streak to the right.

content.description: Climb the right trending serpentine crack thing to bolted anchors.
content.protection: a variety of cams from #2 TCU to #3 Camalot.  Bolted anchor shared with Hair Fuhrer.  One pitch.
content.location: Left end of Lower Left Wall at obvious buttress.

content.description: This testpiece sport route was bolted as a gift to the climbing community. It has a deviously thin start for the first few bolts, but eases to moderate climbing above. It shares anchors with "Hair Fuhrer" and "Drain the Swamp" and is also the rappel for those climbs. The route has seen many attempts, but has not yet been red pointed. Good rock quality.
content.location: Right of the "Drain the Swamp" crack. Leftmost bolted route on the Lower Left (aka MAGA) Wall at Pumpkintown.

content.description: This is the farthest left side wall at Pumpkintown. It is a sunny south west facing two pitch wall. This and the far right areas Mini South Face and Table Town are the places with the most moderate (under 5.9) routes.
